title: JackMazzoni
author: JackMazzoni
content: Loan Amount:  12 USDLoan Purpose:  Renewing my domain.Loan Repay Amount:  15 USDLoan Repay Date:   August 5, 2023Type of Collateral:  NoneEscrow profile Link:  NoneBitcoin Address:    bc1q64nen0jg0dxtmqdnuvqx46jzpe3xpeyy2kuk4a

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: TryNinja on August 29, 2023, 06:56:03 PMWhich domain?Probably the one he's trying to sell:Quote from: JackMazzoni on August 23, 2023, 03:48:25 AMAuction: rpice.com + websiteMininum Bid: 50 usdAuction Ends: August 25, 2023Read some of this guy's other posts before you decide to help him.  Yeah sure, he's only asking for $12 but there are some big red-flags in this guy's post history, including evidence that he has multiple accounts.

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on August 29, 2023, 07:50:41 PMProbably the one he's trying to sell:Quote from: JackMazzoni on August 23, 2023, 03:48:25 AMAuction: rpice.com + websiteMininum Bid: 50 usdAuction Ends: August 25, 2023Yeah, wanted to hear what he had to say because his domain only expires in October, enough time to get $12 (and not need a loan). https://who.is/whois/rpice.comI rather donate to a better cause than some random dude online, so don’t worry.

comments.author: JackMazzoni
comments.created_time: August 29, 2023, 10:20:50 PMLast edit: August 30, 2023, 12:43:45 AM by JackMazzoni
comments.body: It is another domain. It's already expired. It is already on grace period. I may have a few days to reclaim it. Thank you replying in loan thread even though you don't any slight intention of giving me a loan.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: JackMazzoni on August 29, 2023, 10:20:50 PMIt is another domain. It's already expired. It is already on grace period. I may have a few days to reclaim it. Thank you replying in loan thread even though you don't any slight intention of giving me a loan.Yes, I think you understand it right. No one will give you any loan due to your rank and even a $12 loan is a good amount for someone. Your account rank is newbie and with that rank you may not get any loan because many times lenders have been scammed by trusting a newbie and that's why there is no chance for you to get the loan.

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: I guess you can try the namepros forum, perhaps you will find a fellow domainer there to help you.
